Ben Macdui is Scotland's (and the UK's) second highest mountain at 1,309 m, only beaten by 36m by the famous Ben Nevis. My journey continues from [Carn A' Mhaim](https://gm5alx.uk/sota/2024/gm-es-013/), whereby I walked along the ridge, then down (unfortunately) to the side of Ben Macdui.
